about_the_game:
The soundtrack for the Half-Life 2 mod FIREFIGHT RELOADED coming with its ENDGAME update.

My first soundtrack, built over the last few years. Some things may be wonky but I like how it's turned out.

Credits to Vylet Pony for some samples.

Equipment used:

Ableton Live 10 Lite
Korg Volca Drum
Korg Volca Beats
Moog Mavis
Korg Monologue
Moog Mariana (VST)
Roland TR-707 (VST)
Roland TR-808 (VST)
Roland TR-909 (VST)
Cherry Audio DCO-106 (VST)
Green Oak Software's Crystal (VST)
Misc. VSTs.

content_descriptors.notes: FIREFIGHT RELOADED's content is not suitable for general audiences. The content of the game includes intense violence and gore. The covers of this album depicts such content. In addition, some track titles may contain swear words for emphasis.

legal_notice: Made by Bitl Development Studio. Half-Life 2 and the Source Engine are both trademarks of Valve Corporation. This mod was not developed by Valve Corporation. The SMOD font and Half-Life 2 SMOD is created by the_author.
name: FIREFIGHT RELOADED: ENDGAME - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 138 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 363 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Includes MP3 and FLAC files.
